references.paper_title: Infini-gram: Scaling unbounded n-gram language models to a trillion tokens
references.reason: This paper is considered important as it introduces infini-gram, the text search engine used by OLMOTRACE, and addresses how OLMOTRACE works.
This paper is important because it describes the OLMo (Open Language Model) models, which are key to the operation and evaluation of OLMOTRACE.
This reference is key because it introduces the OLMo model which is used for experiments.

references.paper_title: Judging Ilm-as-a-judge with mt-bench and chatbot arena
references.reason: This paper is important because it assesses how to evaluate OLMOTRACE by comparing human evaluations against using LLMs-as-a-judge.

references.paper_title: Understanding black-box predictions via influence functions
references.reason: This paper is a classical approach of tracing LM generation and provides the background for comparisons against OLMOTRACE.
